amendment.description: To provide for the modernization of the energy policy for Indian tribal land.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3029 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3029 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 2953.
